assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Contrel Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of LCD equipment in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers TFT LCD automation products, including macro inspection machine, mini LED inspection machine, TFT/CF/LCD exterior inspection machine, PAD inspection machine, burr check AOI, touch sensor tester, light-on inspection machine, light-on tester, CF/TFT factory conveyance automation, LCD factory conveyance automation, pact/unpack machine, RTP/RTS factory conveyance automation, dry ultrasonic cleaning system, nano production, photo alignment ultraviolet machine, and sealant ultraviolent machine. It also provides semiconductor automation solutions, such as EFEM system, laser marking process, automation, molding lifter, over process automation, plasma process automation, SMT lifter, I-Box automation inspection system, OHCV automated handling system, OHRGV automated handling, shuttle AS/RS, OHL, OHS, FOUP stocker, magazine stocker, N2 Stocker, tray stocker, and vertical carousel AS/RS, as well as laser drilling machine. In addition, the company offers laser equipment comprising TFT array and LCD cell repair equipment, bright point repair systems, OLED dark point repair equipment, circuit repair machines, glass laser cutting machines, OLED mask cleaners, and laser marking/inspection/clean and micro LED repair systems; logistics systems, including smart logistics, high-speed sortation, automated storage, and intelligent handling systems; LED PVD products, such as optical, in line, plasma clean, and E-Beam evaporator sputtering systems; and PSS, micro structure on glass wafer, and nanoimprint products. Contrel Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
